summary.span: 表示 Windows 图标，它是用于表示对象的小位图图像。

span.span: Represents a Windows icon, which is a small bitmap image that is used to represent an object.

summary.span: 尽管图标的大小由系统决定，但仍可将其视为透明的位图。

span.span: Icons can be thought of as transparent bitmaps, although their size is determined by the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以 从文件、流或嵌入资源构造对象。You can construct objects from files, streams, or embedded resources. 有关构造函数的列表，请参阅 。For a list of constructors, see . 还可以 使用方法将转换为位图 。You can also convert an to a bitmap by using the method. 图标资源可以包含多个图标图像。An icon resource can contain multiple icon images. 一个图标文件可能包含几个大小的图像和颜色深度。One icon file may contain images in several sizes and color depths. 在应用程序中使用的映像取决于操作系统和设置。The image that is used in an application depends on the operating system and settings. 以下列表详细说明了图标的典型大小：The following list details the typical sizes for an icon: - 16像素 x 16 像素16 pixels x 16 pixels - 32像素 x 32 像素32 pixels x 32 pixels - 48像素 x 48 像素48 pixels x 48 pixels ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建窗体并将以下代码粘贴到其中。Create a form and paste the following code into it. `IconToBitmap`在窗体的 事件处理程序中调用方法，并 `e` 以形式传递 。Call the `IconToBitmap` method in the form's event handler, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#9)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and attempts to find a version of the icon that matches the requested size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果找不到与大小完全匹配的版本，将使用最接近的匹配项。If a version cannot be found that exactly matches the size, the closest match is used. 如果 `original` 参数是一个 具有单个大小的，则此方法仅创建一个重复的图标。If the `original` parameter is an that has a single size, this method only creates a duplicate icon. 使用方法的拉伸功能 调整图标大小。Use the stretching capabilities of the method to resize the icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的文件不包含匹配所需大小的图像，则返回具有最接近大小的图标。If the specified file does not contain an image that matches the desired size, the icon that has the closest size is returned. `fileName`如果不在当前应用程序目录中，则应包含完整的路径。The `fileName` should include the complete path if it is not in the current application directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数 使用 `resource` 包含参数指定的类型的程序集中的参数指定的名称创建一个 `type` 。This constructor creates an from a resource with the name specified by the `resource` parameter in the assembly that contains the type specified by the `type` parameter. 此构造函数将给定类型的命名空间与资源的字符串名称组合在一起，并在程序集清单中查找匹配项。This constructor combines the namespace of the given type together with the string name of the resource and looks for a match in the assembly manifest. 例如，可以将 类型和传递 `Error.ico` 到此构造函数，并查找名为的资源 `System.Windows.Forms.Error.ico` 。For example you can pass in the type and `Error.ico` to this constructor, and it looks for a resource that is named `System.Windows.Forms.Error.ico`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中，然后处理窗体的 事件。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and handle the form's event. `ConstructAnIconFromAType`从 事件处理程序调用方法，并 `e` 以形式传递 。Call the `ConstructAnIconFromAType` method from the event handler, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 相对路径假定为相对于当前工作目录。A relative path is assumed to be relative to the current working directory. 当 与位图一起使用时，如果运行应用程序的系统的注册表设置导致位图文件显示为缩略图，则可能会返回缩略图，而不是图标。When is used with bitmaps, a thumbnail image may be returned instead of an icon if the system that is running the application has a registry setting that causes bitmap files to be shown as thumbnail images. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中，并 `ExtractAssociatedIconEx` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序调用。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `ExtractAssociatedIconEx` from the form's constructor or event handler. The this method creates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法时，必须使用 Windows API 中的方法释放原始图标， `DestroyIcon` 以确保释放资源。When using this method, you must dispose of the original icon by using the `DestroyIcon` method in the Windows API to ensure that the resources are released. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 。Creates a . - 在屏幕上绘制该对象。Draws that object to the screen. - 获取的图标句柄 。Gets an icon handle for the . - 将 窗体的属性设置为从该句柄创建的图标。Sets the attribute of the form to an icon created from the handle. - 调用 Windows API 函数 `DestroyIcon` 以释放资源。Calls the Windows API function `DestroyIcon` to release resources. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicBitmapExamples/VB/form1.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用枚举从句柄加载位图 ，以及如何使用 方法绘制位图的矩形边界。The following code example demonstrates how to load a bitmap from an handle using the enumeration and how to use the method to draw the rectangle bounds of a bitmap. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建一个包含名为的按钮的窗体 `Button2` 。Create a form that contains a button named `Button2`. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并将此方法与按钮的 事件关联。Paste the code into the form and associate this method with the button's event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当图标转换为位图时，它的透明区域将丢失，并且生成的位图的透明颜色设置为 `RGB(13,11,12)` 。The transparent areas of the icon are lost when it is converted to a bitmap, and the transparent color of the resulting bitmap is set to `RGB(13,11,12)`. 返回的位图与原始图标具有相同的高度和宽度。The returned bitmap has the same height and width as the original icon. > [!NOTE] > 从 framework 版本4.6 开始，为 .ico 文件中的 PNG 帧添加了支持。Beginning with framework version 4.6 support was added for PNG frames in .ico files. 面向早期版本的框架但在4.6 位上运行的应用程序可以通过将以下行添加到 app.config 文件的部分来选择加入新的行为 `` ：``Applications that target earlier versions of the framework but are running on the 4.6 bits can opt in into the new behavior by adding the following line to the `` section of the app.config file:`` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建窗体并将以下代码粘贴到其中。Create a form and paste the following code into it. `IconToBitmap`在窗体的中调用方法。Call the `IconToBitmap` method in the form's . 事件处理程序， `e` 作为传递 。event handler, passing `e` as .
